org.codehaus.preon.channel
Class OutputStreamBitChannel

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.preon.channel.OutputStreamBitChannel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, BitChannel
@NotThreadSafe
public class OutputStreamBitChannel
extends Object
implements BitChannel, Closeable

A BitChannel that wraps an OutputStream.

Constructor Summary
OutputStreamBitChannel(OutputStream out)
          Constructs a new instance, accepting the OutputStream to wrap.
 
Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the channel.
 int getRelativeBitPos()
          Returns the position of the bit pointer in the current byte.
 void write(boolean value)
          Writes the boolean value as a bit to the channel.
 void write(byte[] src, int offset, int length)
          Writes length bytes from the src array of bytes to the channel, starting at the position indicated by offset
 long write(ByteBuffer buffer)
          Writes the contents of the ByteBuffer to the channel.
 void write(int nrbits, byte value)
          Writes nrbits bits of the byte to the channel.
 void write(int nrbits, int value, ByteOrder byteOrder)
          Writes nrbits bits of the int value to the channel, based on the ByteOrder passed in, in case the number of bits exceeds 8.
 void write(int nrbits, long value, ByteOrder byteOrder)
          Writes nrbits bits of the long value to the channel, based on the ByteOrder passed in, in case the number of bits exceeds 8.
 void write(int nrbits, short value, ByteOrder byteOrder)
          Writes nrbits bits of the short value to the channel, based on the ByteOrder passed in, in case the number of bits exceeds 8.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
